MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G69 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Main Street and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have managed to restore supply to a number of customers in the area, for the remaining customers we are still working to repair an underground cable fault near the Lindsaybegg substation and are arranging generators to be brought to site, we now expect your supply to be restored by 5.00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:19am on Wednesday, 24th February 2021
